# AnchoringComponent.PhysicsSimulation

**Enumeration**

Describes the physics simulation space of the entity and its descendants.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PhysicsSimulation
```

## Overview

This allows developers to fine-tune which entities with an `AnchoringComponent` interact with each other physically, as opposed to not interacting at all.

## Enumeration Cases

- **AnchoringComponent.PhysicsSimulation.isolated**: Simulates the entity and its descendants in the entity’s own physics space.
- **AnchoringComponent.PhysicsSimulation.none**: Opts out the entity and its descendants from having their own physics space.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
